data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Meurgey, François (2009): Redescription of Argia concinna (Rambur), with a description of Argia telesfordi spec. nov. from Grenada, West Indies (Zygoptera: Coenagrionidae). Zootaxa 2272: 54-62, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.190994
